issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Description:
The buttons on the orientation test to set landscape or portrait do not function. This only occurs on the v8 compiled KS on the Nexus S. The conolse reports "resetting orientation modes" when clicked, so I have to assume this may be working.


Steps to reproduce:
1) Install KS on device
2) Navigate to Phone>Orientation>
3) Click set orientation button

Result:
Nothing happens

Expected:
Orientation change
fields.summary: Android: Orientation: v8 only: Set orientation buttons do not function
fields.environment: SDK 1.8.0 8911fc4, Titanium Studio, build: 1.0.7.201111061615, Nexus S (2.3.6), Nook Color (2.2), v8 compiler

comments.body:
Tested with 1.8.0.1.v20111207090257
Xoom (3.2.1) - v8
Samsung Tab 10.1 (3.1) - rhino
Samsung Nexus S (2.3.6) - rhino/v8
